Class HDBManagerProjectView

java.lang.Object
view.HDBManagerProjectView
public class HDBManagerProjectView extends Object
View class for HDB Manager's project management functionality

    • addFlatTypeToProject

      private boolean addFlatTypeToProject(String projectName, boolean twoRoomAdded, boolean threeRoomAdded)
      Handles adding a flat type to a project during creation
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      twoRoomAdded - Whether a 2-Room flat has already been added
      threeRoomAdded - Whether a 3-Room flat has already been added
      Returns:
      true if flat was added successfully, false otherwise

      Returns:
